item.title: hugo+github个人笔记部署简易教程
item.description: hugo笔记部署 sudo apt install hugo -y hugo new site dcqwiki cd dcqwiki git git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even/tree/v4.0.0https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even hugo server 本地访问localhost:1313 编译：hugo github创建仓库 名字和githu
